      • getRule

        Rule getRule(Integer ruleId)
        This method returns the applicable rule for the given input criteria.
        Parameters:
        ruleId - Unique id of the rule to get looked up.
        Returns:
        A Rule object if a rule with the given id exists. null otherwise.

      • getRule

        Rule getRule(Map<String,String> inputMap)
      throws Exception
        This method returns the rule applicable for the given combination of rule inputs.
        Parameters:
        inputMap - Map with input names as keys and their String values as values
        Returns:
        null if input is null, null if no rule is applicable for the given input combination the applicable rule otherwise.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getAllApplicableRules

        List<Rule> getAllApplicableRules(Map<String,String> inputMap)
                          throws Exception
        This method returns all rules applicable for the given combination of rule inputs.
        Parameters:
        inputMap - Map with input names as keys and their String values as values
        Returns:
        null if input is null, null if no rule is applicable for the given input combination the applicable rule otherwise.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getNextApplicableRule

        Rule getNextApplicableRule(Map<String,String> inputMap)
                    throws Exception
        This method returns the next rule that will be applicable to the inputs if the current rule applicable to the were to be deleted.
        Parameters:
        inputMap - Map with column Names as keys and column values as values.
        Returns:
        A Rule object if a rule is applicable after the currently applicable rule is deleted. null if no rule is applicable after the currently applicable rule is deleted. null id no rule is currently applicable.
        Throws:
        Exception
